about.blurb: I have spent the last 8 years as a bush firefighter working around Australia. I am now making the transition to become a full stack developer with Coder Academy in Melbourne. I am learning HTML, CSS, Ruby, Rails and the MERN stack.

employment.title: Field Service Officer - Fire and Emergency
description: Respond to all classifications of bushfires on public land in Victoria and on occasion deployed interstate. I am accredited as a fireline crewleader, unimog operator and tree feller.
Operate plant and equipment to ensure maintenance of strategic bushfire management zones
Ensure individual and divisional goals are achieved and services are provided in an effective and timely manner.
Seek to understand stakeholder and customer needs to ensure fit for purpose solutions can be implemented.

employment.title: Project Fire Fighter
description: Participation in bushfire suppression and planned burning operations via deployments for lengthy periods of time in remote bush locations.
Participation as a team member to ensure program objectives are met and that tasks are carried out safely.
Maintaining high levels of OH&S standards within the workplace.

education.about: HTML, CSS, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, MERN stack
Specialist Math, Math Methods, Further Math, Physics, English, Accounting
